potion: A spray-type wound medicine. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 20 points.
super potion: A spray-type wound medicine. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.
hyper potion: A spray-type wound medicine. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 200 points.
max potion: A spray-type wound medicine. It fully restores the HP of one Pokémon.
full restore: A medicine that fully restores the HP and heals any status problems of one Pokémon.
fresh water: Water with a high mineral content. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.
soda pop: A fizzy soda drink. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 60 points.
lemonade: A very sweet drink. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 80 points.
moo moo milk: Highly nutritious milk. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 100 points.
energy root: A very bitter root. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 200 points.
energy powder: A very bitter medicine powder. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.
berry juice: A 100% pure juice. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 20 points.
sacred ash: Revives all fainted Pokémon, restoring HP fully.
ether: Restores a selected move's PP by 10 points for one Pokémon.
max ether: Fully restores a selected move's PP for one Pokémon.
elixer: Restores the PP of all moves for one Pokémon by 10 points each.
max elixer: Fully restores the PP of all moves for one Pokémon.
revival herb: A very bitter medicinal herb. It revives a fainted Pokémon, restoring HP fully.
revive: A medicine that revives a fainted Pokémon, restoring HP by half the maximum amount.
max revive: A medicine that revives a fainted Pokémon, restoring HP fully.
antidote: A spray-type medicine. It heals one Pokémon from a poisoning.
awakening: A spray-type medicine. It awakens a sleeping Pokémon.
burn heal: A spray-type medicine. It heals one Pokémon of a burn.
ice heal: A spray-type medicine. It defrosts a frozen Pokémon.
paralyz heal: A spray-type medicine. It heals one Pokémon from paralysis.
full heal: A spray-type medicine. It heals all the status problems of one Pokémon.
lava cookie: Lavaridge Town's local specialty. It heals all the status problems of one Pokémon.
heal powder: A very bitter medicine powder. It heals all the status problems of one Pokémon.
calcium: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Sp. Atk stat of one Pokémon.
carbos: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Speed stat of one Pokémon.
hp up: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base HP of one Pokémon.
iron: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Defense stat of one Pokémon.
pp max: Raises the PP of a selected move to its maximum level for one Pokémon.
pp up: Slightly raises the maximum PP of a selected move for one Pokémon.
protien: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Attack stat of one Pokémon.
rare candy: A candy that is packed with energy. It raises the level of a Pokémon by one.
zinc: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Sp. Def stat of one Pokémon.
dire hit: Raises the critical-hit ratio of Pokémon in battle. Wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
guard spec: An item that prevents stat reduction among party Pokémon for five turns after use.
x accuracy: Raises the accuracy stat of Pokémon in battle. Wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
x attack: Raises the ATTACK stat of Pokémon in battle. Wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
x defense: Raises the DEFENSE stat of Pokémon in battle. Wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
x special: Raises the SP. ATK stat of Pokémon in battle. Wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
x speed: Raises the SPEED stat of Pokémon in battle. Wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
amulet coin: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles the battle money if the holding Pokémon takes part.
black belt: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A belt that boosts determination and FIGHTING-type moves.
black glasses: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A shady-looking pair of glasses that boosts DARK-type moves.
bright powder: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It casts a tricky glare that lowers the opponent's accuracy.
charcoal: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A combustible fuel that boosts the power of FIRE-type moves.
choice band: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It powers up one move, which becomes the only usable one.
cleanse tag: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It repels wild Pokémon if the holder is first in the party.
deep sea scale: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A scale that shines a faint pink. It raises the SP. DEF stat.
deep sea tooth: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A fang that gleams a sharp silver. It raises the SP. ATK stat.
dragon fang: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A hard and sharp fang that boosts the power of DRAGON-type moves.
dragon scale: A thick and tough scale. A DRAGON-type Pokémon may be holding it.
everstone: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holding Pokémon is prevented from evolving.
exp share: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder gets a share of EXP. points without having to battle.
focus band: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holding Pokémon may endure an attack, leaving just 1 HP.
hard stone: An item to be held by a Pokémon. An unbreakable stone that boosts the power of ROCK-type moves.
king's rock: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It may cause the foe to flinch upon taking damage.
lax incense: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Its tricky aroma slightly reduces the foe's accuracy.
leftovers: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holding Pokémon gradually regains HP during battle.
light ball: An orb to be held by a PIKACHU that raises the SP. ATK stat. Touching it may cause a shock.
lucky egg: An item to be held by a Pokémon. An egg filled with happiness that earns extra EXP. points in battle.
lucky punch: A glove to be held by a CHANSEY. It raises CHANSEY's critical-hit ratio.
macho brace: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It promotes strong growth but lowers SPEED while it is held.
magnet: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A powerful magnet that boosts the power of ELECTRIC-type moves.
mental herb: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It snaps the holder out of infatuation. It can be used once.
metal coat: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A special metallic film that boosts the power of STEEL-type moves.
metal powder: A fine, hard powder to be held by a DITTO. It raises DITTO's DEFENSE stat.
miracle seed: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A seed imbued with life that boosts the power of GRASS-type moves.
mystic water: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A teardrop-shaped gem that boosts the power of WATER-type moves.
nevermeltice: n item to be held by a Pokémon. A piece of ice that repels heat and boosts ICE-type moves.
poison barb: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A small, poisonous barb that boosts the power of POISON-type moves.
quick claw: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A light and sharp claw. The holder may be able to strike first.
scope lense: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A lens that boosts the critical-hit ratio of the holding Pokémon.
sea incense: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It slightly boosts the power of WATER-type moves.
shap beak: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A long, sharp beak that boosts the power of FLYING-type moves.
shell bell: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holding Pokémon regains some HP upon striking the foe.
silk scarf: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A sumptuous scarf that boosts the power of NORMAL-type moves.
silver powder: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A shiny silver powder that boosts the power of BUG-type moves.
smoke ball: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holding Pokémon can flee from any wild Pokémon for sure.
soft sand: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A loose, silky sand that boosts the power of GROUND-type moves.
soothe bell: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A bell with a comforting chime that makes the holder calm and friendly.
soul dew: An orb to be held by a LATIOS or LATIAS. It raises the SP. ATK and SP. DEF stats.
spell tag: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A sinister, eerie tag that boosts GHOST-type moves.
stick: A stick of leek to be held by a FARFETCH'D. It raises FARFETCH'D's critical-hit ratio.
thick club: A hard bone of some sort to be held by a CUBONE or MAROWAK. It raises the ATTACK stat.
twisted spoon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A spoon imbued with telekinetic power boosts PSYCHIC-type moves.
white herb: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It restores any lowered stat in battle. It can be used only once.
blue scarf: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the holding Pokémon's BEAUTY condition in CONTESTS.
green scarf: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the holding Pokémon's SMART condition in CONTESTS.
pink scarf: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the holding Pokémon's CUTE condition in CONTESTS.
red scarf: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the holding Pokémon's COOL condition in CONTESTS.
yellow scarf: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the holding Pokémon's TOUGH condition in CONTESTS.
black flute: A black glass flute. When blown, it makes wild Pokémon less likely to appear.
blue flute: A blue glass flute that awakens a sleeping Pokémon.
red flute: A red glass flute that snaps one Pokémon out of infatuation.
white flute: A white glass flute. When blown, it makes wild Pokémon more likely to appear.
yellow flute: A yellow glass flute that snaps one Pokémon out of confusion.
moon stone: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as black as the night sky.
fire stone: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is colored orange.
leaf stone: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a leaf pattern.
thunderstone: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a thunderbolt pattern.
sun stone: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as red as the sun.
water stone: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is a clear, light blue.
upgrade: A transparent device filled with all sorts of data. It is made by SILPH CO.
blue shard: A small blue shard. It appears to be from some sort of a tool made long ago.
green shard: A small green shard. It appears to be from some sort of a tool made long ago.
red shard: A small red shard. It appears to be from some sort of a tool made long ago.
yellow shard: A small yellow shard. It appears to be from some sort of a tool made long ago.
escape rope: long, durable rope. Use it to escape instantly from a cave or a dungeon.
fluffy tail: An attractive item. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokémon.
pokedoll: An attractive doll. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokémon.
shoal salt: Pure salt obtained from deep inside the SHOAL CAVE. It is extremely salty.
shoal shell: A pretty seashell found deep inside the SHOAL CAVE. It is striped in blue and white.
max repel: Prevents weak wild Pokémon from appearing for 250 steps.
repel: revents weak wild Pokémon from appearing for 100 steps.
super repel: Prevents weak wild Pokémon from appearing for 200 steps.
big pearl: A quite-large pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold at a high price.
big mushroom: A large and rare mushroom. It is very popular among certain people.
heart scale: A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is extremely rare. It glows faintly in the colors of a rainbow.
nugget: A nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. It can be sold at a high price.
pearl: A relatively small pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold cheaply.
star piece: A shard of a pretty gem that sparkles in a red color. It can be sold at a high price.
stardust: A pretty red sand with a loose, silky feel. It can be sold at a high price.
tinymushroom: A small and rare mushroom. It is quite popular among certain people.
pokeball: A ball thrown to catch a wild Pokémon. It is designed in a capsule style.
great ball: A good, quality Ball that offers a higher Pokémon catch rate than a standard Poké Ball.
ultra ball: A very high-grade Ball that offers a higher Pokémon catch rate than a Great Ball.
master ball: The best Ball with the ultimate performance. It will catch any wild Pokémon without fail.
dive ball: A somewhat different Ball that works especially well on Pokémon deep in the sea.
luxury ball: A comfortable Ball that makes a captured wild Pokémon quickly grow friendly.
nest ball: A somewhat different Ball that works especially well on weaker Pokémon.
net ball: A somewhat different Ball that works especially well on Water- and Bug-type Pokémon.
premier ball: A rare Ball that has been specially made to commemorate an event of some sort.
repeat ball: A somewhat different Ball that works especially well on Pokémon caught before.
safari ball: A special Ball that is used only in the Safari Zone. It is finished with a camouflage pattern.
timer ball: A somewhat different Ball that becomes progressively better the more turns there are in a battle.
bead mail: A piece of Mail to be held by a Pokémon. It will bear the print of the Pokémon holding it.
dream mail: A piece of Mail to be held by a Pokémon. It will bear the print of the Pokémon holding it.
glitter mail: A piece of Mail featuring a cute Pikachu print. It is to be held by a Pokémon.
gorgeous mail: A piece of Mail featuring a gorgeous, extravagant print. It is to be held by a Pokémon.
harbor mail: A piece of Mail featuring a cute Wingull print. It is to be held by a Pokémon.
mech mail: A piece of Mail featuring a cute Magnemite print. It is to be held by a Pokémon.
orange mail: A piece of Mail featuring a cute Zigzagoon print. It is to be held by a Pokémon.
retro mail: A piece of Mail featuring a print of three cute Pokémon. It is to be held by a Pokémon.
shadow mail: A piece of Mail featuring a cute Duskull print. It is to be held by a Pokémon.
tropic mail: A piece of Mail featuring a cute Bellossom print. It is to be held by a Pokémon.
wave mail: A piece of Mail featuring a cute Wailmer print. It is to be held by a Pokémon.
wood mail: A piece of Mail featuring a cute Slakoth print. It is to be held by a Pokémon.
aurora ticket: A ticket required to board the ship to Birth Island. It glows beautifully.
berry bag: A pouch for carrying Berries. It is attached to the bag's compartment for important items.
bike: A folding bicycle that allows faster movement than the Running Shoes.
bike voucher: Take this voucher to the BIKE SHOP in CERULEAN CITY and exchange it for a bicycle.
card key: A card-type key that unlocks doors in SILPH CO.'s HEAD OFFICE in SAFFRON CITY.
coin case: A case for holding COINS obtained at the GAME CORNER. It holds up to 9,999 COINS.
dome fossil: A fossil of an ancient, seafloor- dwelling Pokémon. It appears to be part of a shell.
fame checker: A device that enables you to recall what you've heard and seen about famous people.
gold teeth: A set of false teeth lost by the SAFARI ZONE'S WARDEN. It makes his smile sparkle.
good rod: A new, good-quality fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild Pokémon.
helix fossil: A fossil of an ancient, seafloor- dwelling Pokémon. It appears to be part of a seashell.
item finder: A device used for finding items. If there is a hidden item nearby when it is used, it emits a signal.
lift key: A key that operates the elevator in TEAM ROCKET's HIDEOUT. It bears the TEAM ROCKET logo.
meteorite: A meteorite that fell from space onto Mt. Moon long ago. It is very lumpy and hard.
mystery ticket: A ticket required to board the ship to Navel Rock. It glows with a mystic light.
oak's parcel: A parcel to be delivered to PROF. OAK from VIRIDIAN CITY's Pokémon MART.
old amber: A piece of amber that contains the genes of an ancient Pokémon. It is clear with a reddish tint.
old rod: An old and beat-up fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild Pokémon.
pokeflute: A flute that is said to instantly awaken any Pokémon. It has a lovely tone.
powder jar: A jar for storing Berry Powder made using a Berry Crusher.
rainbow pass: A pass for ferries between VERMILION and the SEVII ISLANDS. It features a drawing of a rainbow.
ruby: An exquisitely beautiful gem that has a red glow. It symbolizes passion.
sapphire: An exquisitely beautiful gem that has a blue glow. It symbolizes honesty.
secret key: The key to CINNABAR ISLAND GYM's front door. It is colored red and decorated.
silph scope: A scope that makes unseeable Pokémon visible. It is made by SILPH CO.
ss ticket: The ticket required for sailing on the ferry S.S. ANNE. It has a drawing of a ship on it.
super rod: An awesome, high-tech fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild Pokémon.
tea: An aromatic tea prepared by an old lady. It will slake even the worst thirst.
teachy tv: A television set that is tuned to a program with useful tips for novice TRAINERS.
tm case: A case that holds TMs and HMs. It is attached to the BAG's compartment for important items.
town map: A very convenient map that can be viewed anytime. It even shows your present location.
tri pass: A pass for ferries between ONE, TWO, and THREE ISLAND. It has a drawing of three islands.
vs seeker: A device that indicates TRAINERS who want to battle. The battery charges while traveling.
